1: The rise of e-commerce has transformed consumer behavior, enabling greater convenience but also raising concerns about the impact on local businesses.
(1) E-commerce has had no effect on how consumers shop or on local businesses.
(2) Consumers prefer shopping locally rather than using e-commerce platforms.
(3) Local businesses are thriving due to the rise of e-commerce.
(4) While e-commerce offers more convenience to consumers, it also poses challenges for local businesses.
des_1: الخيار (4) هو الأنسب، لأنه يعكس تأثير التجارة الإلكترونية على سلوك المستهلكين والقلق بشأن الشركات المحلية.
2: The increase in telecommuting has reshaped traditional work environments, offering employees greater flexibility but also blurring the lines between work and personal life.
(1) Telecommuting has made work environments more rigid and less flexible.
(2) The rise of telecommuting allows for more employee flexibility, but it can also complicate the separation between work and personal time.
(3) Employees prefer working in traditional office settings over telecommuting.
(4) Telecommuting eliminates any issues related to work-life balance.
des_2: الخيار (2) هو الأنسب، لأنه يعكس فوائد وعيوب العمل عن بُعد.
3: The recent advancements in artificial intelligence have the potential to revolutionize industries, yet they also pose significant ethical challenges that must be addressed.
(1) While AI can transform industries, it brings forth important ethical issues that need attention.
(2) AI advancements only benefit industries without any ethical concerns.
(3) Ethical challenges are irrelevant to the development of artificial intelligence.
(4) Industries are fully prepared to handle the ethical implications of AI.
des_3: الخيار (1) هو الأنسب، لأنه يوضح كيف يمكن أن تكون التكنولوجيا مفيدة ولكنها تتطلب معالجة القضايا الأخلاقية.
4: The decline in fossil fuel reserves has accelerated the push for alternative energy sources, prompting innovations in solar and wind technologies.
(1) The availability of fossil fuels is increasing, leading to fewer innovations in alternative energy.
(2) Innovations in solar and wind technologies have nothing to do with fossil fuel reserves.
(3) As fossil fuel reserves diminish, there is a greater focus on developing alternative energy technologies like solar and wind.
(4) The transition to alternative energy sources is unnecessary given the current fossil fuel supply.
des_4: الخيار (3) هو الأنسب، لأنه يعكس العلاقة بين تراجع احتياطيات الوقود الأحفوري وزيادة الابتكار في مصادر الطاقة البديلة.
